The selection process will be conducted as follows: Receiving application and CV: Our procedure is as follow:
 
Any candidate who does not explain their position in hie/her CV will not accepted. 

Human Resources Department, on receiving a job announcement, will arrange to have a shortlist CV for each position, by location set up, position.

The Human Resources Department will wait the applications before the closing date for each position and conduct preliminary screening and pick more or less 10 potential CVs to for short-listing.

Short-listing of candidate will be done by the selection criteria such as previous job relevant experience, education background, professional job profile etc.

Candidates who meet all selection criteria or have reasonable and suitable qualifications and skills to fulfil the job requirements will likely be short-listed for further consideration.

Short-listed candidates will be advised by the HR department that they will be invited to an interview and will complete skills tests and will be required to provide original documentary evidence of any certificates, degrees or diplomas claimed in their application during the interview.

Candidates who successfully passed the interview shall undergo the reference check through those referees quoted by the candidate. If any candidate at this stage appears to have had major problems or inappropriate behavior whist working with their previous employers, that particular candidate will no longer be condidered. Note that conduction reference checks at this stage with cnadidate's current employer is subject to agreement with candidate .\n\nHR will proceed employment process for candidates
